doc:
Howard Morris https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howard_Morris 0 Howard Jerome Morris (September 4, 1919 – May 21, 2005) was an American actor, voice actor and director who was best known for his role in The Andy Griffith Show as Ernest T. Bass, and as "Uncle Goopy" in one of the most celebrated comedy sketches in history, on Sid Caesar's Your Show of Shows (1954). Howard_Jerome_Morris ( September_4_,_1919 – May_21_,_2005 ) was an_American_actor , voice_actor and director who was_best_known for his_role in The_Andy_Griffith_Show as Ernest_T._Bass , and as "_Uncle_Goopy " in one of the_most_celebrated_comedy_sketches in history , on Sid_Caesar 's_Your_Show of Shows ( 1954 ) .
